extensionDesc.message: An AI-powered browser extension for image caption generation.

enableExtensionLegend.description: Legend for the enable extension checkbox.

enableExtensionLabel.description: Label for the enable extension checkbox.

languageLegend.description: Legend for the language selection fieldset.

genModeLegend.message: Choose how captions should be generated
genModeLegend.description: Legend for caption generation mode selection.

altCaptionLabel.description: Label for alt caption radio option.

figcaptionCaptionLabel.description: Label for figcaption caption radio option.

genConditionLegend.description: Legend for caption generation condition selection.

unlabeledImagesLabel.description: Label for the radio button that only generates captions for unlabeled images.

unlabeledImagesDesc.message: Will only generate a caption if the image does not already contain one.
unlabeledImagesDesc.description: Description for the 'Only unlabeled images' option.

allImagesLabel.description: Label for the radio button that generates captions for all images.

allImagesDesc.message: Will always generate a caption. If the image already has a caption it will be overwritten.
